tags.name: zui-pages
tags.description:
`<zui-pages>`is used to select one of its children to show. One use is to cycle through a list of children "pages"; works great with `<zui-tabs>`, where upon clicking a different tab, the corresponding page seen updates.
Behind the scenes `<zui-pages>` is based on Polymer's `<iron-pages>`.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Defines which child element is selected, where is selected="0" is first direct descendant, and selected="1" would be second child etc
